coder.label: What is Coder?
coder.response: Coder is a platform for accelerating the development and growth of innovative new ventures. Our mission is to enable anyone, anywhere, to be able to build anything. We’ve designed a more efficient model providing superior economics through automation and intelligence, and so we’ve built a software platform running on the Ethereum blockchain to enable transparency, speed, and risk mitigation to bring to market a truly decentralized and global accelerator dedicated to new venture development.
